Deleting duplicates

```{r deleteDups}
insol_de <- insol_filter %>% unique()
```

Missing values check

```{r displayNAs}
na_vals <- insol_de %>%
  summarise_all(list( ~ sum(is.na(.))))

nas_df <- tibble(
  Variable = names(insol_de),
  `NA count` = t(na_vals)
)

kable(nas_df) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE)
```
